headline: Why Gartner (IT) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of research and advisory firm Gartner (NYSE:IT) fell 4.2% in the afternoon session after Wolfe Research initiated coverage on the stock with a neutral 'Peerperform' rating, citing several pressures on the business. The research firm noted that Gartner's shares are under pressure due to budget constraints and concerns about AI disintermediation. This sentiment follows the company's recent second-quarter report, where it met analyst estimates but revealed that its total contract value grew
